CustomField.description: Field to return the Sub Type Description from the Custom Setting 'Partner Addendum Sub Type Description'
CustomField.formula: CASE(Sub_Type__c, "Acceptance of Defence Parcels Less Than 2kg" ,$Setup.PA_ST_Desc__c.Accept_Defence_Parcels_Less_Than_2__c, "Ad-hoc",$Setup.PA_ST_Desc__c.Ad_hoc__c, "Annual Lease Fee",$Setup.PA_ST_Desc__c.Annual_Lease_Fee__c, "Annual Phone Subsidy Amount",$Setup.PA_ST_Desc__c.Annual_Phone_Subsidy_Amount__c, "Annual Rent Subsidy Amount",$Setup.PA_ST_Desc__c.Annual_Rent_Subsidy_Amount__c, "Business Counter Delivery Points Variation", $Setup.PA_ST_Desc__c.Bus_Counter_Delivery_Points_Var__c, "Business Delivery Points Variation",$Setup.PA_ST_Desc__c.Bus_Delivery_Points_Var__c, "Business Transit Points Variation",$Setup.PA_ST_Desc__c.Bus_Transit_Points_Var__c, "Clearance of Remote SPB Fee",$Setup.PA_ST_Desc__c.Clearance_of_Remote_SPB_Fee__c, "Counter Collection on non RSD days", $Setup.PA_ST_Desc__c.Counter_Collection_on_non_RSD_days__c, "Customer Transfer Fee",$Setup.PA_ST_Desc__c.Customer_Transfer_Fee__c, "Interest Free Loan",$Setup.PA_ST_Desc__c.Interest_Free_Loan__c, "Mail Bag Despatched Variation",$Setup.PA_ST_Desc__c.Mail_Bag_Despatched_Var__c, "Mail Conveyancing Fee",$Setup.PA_ST_Desc__c.Mail_Conveyancing_Fee__c, "Mail Service Payment",$Setup.PA_ST_Desc__c.Mail_Service_Payment__c, "Miscellaneous Type 1",$Setup.PA_ST_Desc__c.Misc_Type_1__c, "Miscellaneous Type 2",$Setup.PA_ST_Desc__c.Misc_Type_2__c, "Miscellaneous Type 3",$Setup.PA_ST_Desc__c.Misc_Type_3__c, "Negotiated Accommodation Fee",$Setup.PA_ST_Desc__c.Negotiated_Accom_Fee__c, "New Business Spotter's Fee",$Setup.PA_ST_Desc__c.New_Bus_Spotters_Fee__c, "Private Counter Delivery Points Variation", $Setup.PA_ST_Desc__c.Pri_Counter_Delivery_Points_Var__c, "Private Delivery Points Variation",$Setup.PA_ST_Desc__c.Pri_Delivery_Points_Var__c, "Private Transit Points Variation",$Setup.PA_ST_Desc__c.Pri_Transit_Points_Var__c, "Public Liability",$Setup.PA_ST_Desc__c.Public_Liability__c, "Refurbishment Loan",$Setup.PA_ST_Desc__c.Refurbishment_Loan__c, "Repayment Arrangement",$Setup.PA_ST_Desc__c.Repayment_Arrangement__c, "Representation Allowance - First Day Covers", $Setup.PA_ST_Desc__c.Rep_Allow_First_Day_Covers__c, "Representation Allowance - Reply Paid",$Setup.PA_ST_Desc__c.Rep_Allow_Reply_Paid__c, "Security Loan",$Setup.PA_ST_Desc__c.Security_Loan__c, "Storage of Carded Articles Annual Fee", $Setup.PA_ST_Desc__c.Storage_of_Carded_Articles_Annual_Fee__c, "Storage of Mail Fee",$Setup.PA_ST_Desc__c.Storage_of_Mail_Fee__c, "")
CustomField.label: Sub Type Description
